title: Compare artiststs in soc. Baroque to 20th c

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure you are prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Compare and contrast the relationship between artists and society in the Baroque era and in the twentieth century. Illustrate your essay with references to at least TWO examples for each period.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
